query:
ALTER TABLE job_applications 
ADD COLUMN status ENUM('pending', 'reviewed', 'accepted', 'rejected') DEFAULT 'pending' AFTER resume_url,
ADD COLUMN employer_response TEXT AFTER status,
ADD COLUMN status_updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AFTER employer_response;
